ch0191_00_achroma/0101_0701_02_10:
Please show me the strength of you and
your Pokémon!
ch0191_00_achroma/7101_0701_01_10:
The theme of my research is “Bringing out the
potential of Pokémon.”
ch0191_00_achroma/7101_0701_02_10: If you don’t mind, I’d like to hear your ideas!
ch0191_00_achroma/7102_0701_01_10:
I must get stronger as a Trainer for my
own research!
ch0191_00_achroma/7102_0701_02_10:
I’m so happy that I can do my research
while battling!
ch0191_00_achroma/7103_0701_01_10:
Pasio is full of brilliant Trainers that can bring out
a Pokémon’s strength! It’s great! Extremely great!
ch0191_00_achroma/7103_0701_02_10:
I am so excited because my research is going to
take massive steps forward!
ch0191_00_achroma/7104_0701_01_10:
In addition to Trainers, Pokémon Professors from
different regions have gathered on Pasio.
ch0191_00_achroma/7104_0701_02_10:
I’d like to talk with them about our individual
research topics!
ch0191_00_achroma/7105_0701_01_10:
You are a very talented
Trainer, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0191_00_achroma/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m very interested in what kind of power you can
draw out as a sync pair!
ch0191_00_achroma/1701_0701_01_10: I found this! This is from me!
ch0191_00_achroma/1701_0702_01_10: No need to thank me! I did it because I wanted to!
ch0191_00_achroma/2501_0701_01_10:
How you interact with Pokémon is very similar to
the Trainers I have met before.
ch0191_00_achroma/2501_0701_02_10:
They were talented Trainers who were able to
obtain strength by building a bond, just like you.
ch0191_00_achroma/2501_0702_01_10:
I can get results way beyond my expectations from
amazing research subjects!
ch0191_00_achroma/2501_0702_02_10:
Yes... You! You’re the most outstanding research
subject I have seen in a while!
ch0191_00_achroma/2501_0702_03_10:
I’d like to keep observing your progress.
I hope you don’t mind!
ch0191_00_achroma/2511_0701_01_10:
I have done my research in many different places
so far.
ch0191_00_achroma/2511_0701_02_10: And I have finally found the answer I desire!
ch0191_00_achroma/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s the bond! I realized the key is the bond
between the Trainer and the Pokémon!
ch0191_00_achroma/2511_0702_01_10:
The bond between a Pokémon and its Trainer
definitely brings out incredible power...
ch0191_00_achroma/2511_0702_02_10:
But that doesn’t mean that’s the only answer!
There can be many answers!
ch0191_00_achroma/2511_0702_03_10:
This is why I keep on researching. To reach the
truth I yearn for as a scholar!
ch0191_00_achroma/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I was so engrossed in my research
that I didn’t get a wink of sleep last night.
ch0191_00_achroma/3003_0701_01_10:
Good morning... Hm? Oh, pardon me! Is the sun
that high in the sky already?
ch0191_00_achroma/3005_0701_01_10:
The sun’s gone down. It’s the end of yet another
day, but my research marches on!
